ygData.subject: Re: New Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: Only 4 races can be Keepers of the Craft: Erudites, Gnomes, High Elves and Tier Dal (Dark Elves). Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server)
ygData.messageBody:
Only 4 races can be Keepers of the Craft: Erudites, Gnomes, High Elves and
Tier'Dal (Dark Elves).

Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
http://www.hoa-rpg.com/

> -----Original Message-----
> From: eqenchanters-owner@...
> [mailto:eqenchanters-owner@...]
> Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 1:53 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] New Survey
>
>
> From: eqenchanters-owner@...
>
> Hello,
>
> There is a new survey for the eqenchanters community.
>
> I was just wondering what other people had chosen, so I'm sending
> out this survey. I'm not sure if some of the choices I put here
> are really able to be enchanters, but I guess I'll find out. What
> race is your enchanter?
>
> ----
>
> Possible answers are:
>
> o Human
> o Half-Elf
> o High Elf
> o Wood Elf
> o Erudite
> o Dark Elf
> o Dwarf
> o Gnome
> o Halfling
>
>
> To vote, please visit the following web page:
>
http://www.onelist.com/surveycenter/eqenchanters


Thanks!

eqenchanters Owner
